name: Aarav Sharma
experience: The interview process was challenging but rewarding. Focused on data structures and algorithms.

name: Diya Patel
experience: Great experience, the case studies were very insightful. The culture seems amazing.

name: Vikram Rathore
experience: Experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure is crucial. The interview process was very hands-on.

name: Isha Sharma
experience: They value a data-driven approach to marketing. The case study was based on real-world scenarios.

experience: Problem-solving and analytical skills are key. The interview process tests your ability to handle pressure.

experience: A good understanding of financial modeling and valuation is required. The technical rounds were intense.
